awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 4 nominations.

fullplot: Hamlet, Prince of Denmark, returns home to find his father murdered by Claudius, Hamlet's uncle. Claudius usurps the throne of Denmark, and marries Hamlet's recently widowed mother. Hamlet is tormented, haunted, and increasingly unstable.

title: Hamlet
